      • execute

        public ReturnType execute()
                   throws KamaException,
                          IOException
        Executes the wrapped request, using the Kama protocol.
        Returns:
        the object that was embedded in the JSON response, or null if void.
        Throws:
        KamaException
        IOException

      • executeReturnsObjectsList

        public List<ReturnType> executeReturnsObjectsList()
                                           throws KamaException,
                                                  IOException
        Executes the wrapped request, using the Kama protocol.
        Returns:
        the list of objects that was embedded in the JSON response.
        Throws:
        KamaException
        IOException
